extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMovable(MovableShape mshape)
      OVERVIEW: adds a new movable to movables MODIFIES: movables EFFECT: This function add movable shape if it is not colliding with any object already in movables
      void animate()
      OVERVIEW: moves the game 1 cycle MODIFIES: paddle, ball, movables EFFECT: moves the cycle of the game 1 step by making each object move according to its velocity and then it checks collisions between objects and then removes destroyed objects as a result of previous steps
      GameData getData()
      OVERVIEW: This function wraps board data into a GameData type and returns it EFFECT: creates a copy of each movable and wraps them inside a GameData instance and returns it
      void movePaddleLeft()
      OVERVIEW: This function moves the paddle to the left MODIFIES: paddle
      void movePaddleRight()
      OVERVIEW: This function moves the paddle to the right MODIFIES: paddle
      boolean repOK() 
      void rotatePaddleLeft()
      OVERVIEW: This function rotates the paddle to the left MODIFIES: paddle
      void rotatePaddleRight()
      OVERVIEW: This function rotates the paddle to the right MODIFIES: paddle
